articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Helldivers 2 Patch 1.000.102 Makes Chargers and Bile Titans Easier to Deal With, but Has ‘Not Reduced Difficulty’ - IGN
articles.description: Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead has released patch 1.000.102, which makes Chargers and Bile Titans easier to deal with. The update is out now on PC and coming soon on PlayStation 5.
articles.content:
Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead has released a new patch that makes the games toughest enemies easier to deal with.
Patch 1.000.102 deals with the spawn rate of heavily armored Terminid enemies as … [+7279 chars]

articles.author: Marion Willingham
articles.title: The Toast of the craft world - Financial Times
articles.description: The British fashion brand’s New Makers programme spotlights five great artisans
articles.content: British brand Toast strives to make clothes that last; its resident menders even darn, patch and appliqué garments to give worn items extra life. This commitment to craftsmanship is also true of Toas… [+3461 chars]

articles.title: Here's how to see 'horned' comet 12P/Pons-Brooks in the night sky this month (video) - Space.com
articles.description: This year, 12P/Pons-Brooks will arrive at perihelion on April 21, but it is already up to its old tricks regarding sudden flare-ups in brightness.
